channel.title: Need for speed most wanted
channel.description:
Title: Need for speed Most Wanted
Genre-- Racing
Age: 3+
Review:This is a very good game with a high range of customisation to be done. I would say that the interfaces are amazing and also the graphics are quite good. I would also like to say that it will test your driving quite well because it has a wide range of surfaces to drive on and a wide variety of weather.
Ups--Good Music, Good Graphics, Good Interfaces
Downs--Not big enough world
System Info -- PS2, XBOX, PSP and PC
Thank you
Hope this helps you out
[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 05:46:23 PM[/size][hr]ty for all comments
